title: Council Directive 98/9/EC of 20 January 1998 on the list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Regulation (EC) No 950/97 (Denmark)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 98/9/EC of 20 January 1998 on the list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Regulation (EC) No 950/97 (Denmark)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The list of less-favoured farming areas in Denmark shall be that contained in the Annex to this Directive. They shall be included in the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Article 25 of Regulation (EC) No 950/97.
This Directive shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Directive is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 January 1998.
For the Council
The President
J. CUNNINGHAM
(1) OJ L 142, 2. 6. 1997, p. 1.
(2) OJ C 372, 9. 12. 1997, p. 21.
